page.title: 02A GIRL'S DAY IN NORTH YATE
page.content: I get up at approximately 7.30am. I go downstairs,get my breakfast,go upstairs,wash,clean my teeth and get dressed.I go down,make my sandwiches and drink,and put it all in my bag.By this time it is about 8.30am.Then I get my bike out of our shed,put my bag in my basket,and go up to Charlotte's. Then I wait for Charlotte for about five minutes. Then we do her rabbit, get her bike out and come to school. Then we carry on with our work until 3.30pm. Then it is time to go home. At Charlotte's house,Charlotte goes in, while I go on. I try to fill the time by playing with Sophie or Charlotte or watching the television.Then we all sit down,and at 9.30pm_10.00pm we all go to bed.
